text: with violent reproaches - and here he was bland and smiling. But it did not take her long to realise that his mood was less pleasant than appeared on the surface. He told her nonchalantly, as he led the way to his own veranda, that he had taken the liberty of asking Jack - as a representative of the Vallin family - to come over and make the presentation in her stead.
